review_text: While I love the ice cream this machine makes, the motor has a lot of problems. On only its second use, the motor hummed and wouldn't start for several minutes. It did this consistently over the next year but would start up after 5 or 10 minutes. However, now the motor just stops halfway through the process because it's overheating too quickly. Maybe I just got a lemon, but this is a pretty poor motor.
summary: Makes great ice cream, but motor has problems
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
